info.description:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ourresearch/openalex-docs/main/.gitbook/assets/OpenAlex-logo-5.png)

**OpenAlex** is a fully open catalog of the global research system.

It's named after the [ancient Library of Alexandria](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Library_of_Alexandria) and made by the nonprofit [OurResearch](https://ourresearch.org/).

This OpenAPI specification is derived from spec generated by [openapi-devtools](https://github.com/AndrewWalsh/openapi-devtools).
info.title: OpenAlex

parameters.description: [docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication](https://docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication#the-polite-pool)
parameters.name: User-Agent

parameters.description:
The API is the primary way to get OpenAlex data. It's free and requires no authentication.
The daily limit for API calls is 100,000 requests per user per day.
For best performance, add your email to all API requests
The email can be either in the query string, like `mailto:example@domain.com`, or in the User-Agent request header, like `User-Agent: my-app (mailto:example@domain.com)`.
Read more about the polite pool at [docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication](https://docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication#the-polite-pool).
parameters.name: mailto

parameters.description:
Filter works by a specific field.
See the [filter works](https://docs.openalex.org/api-entities/works/filter-works) documentation for more information.
Valid filters are:


- `abstract.search`
- `apc_list.currency`
- `apc_list.provenance`
- `apc_list.value`
- `apc_list.value_usd`
- `apc_paid.currency`

parameters.description:
The API is the primary way to get OpenAlex data. It's free and requires no authentication.
The daily limit for API calls is 100,000 requests per user per day.
For best performance, add your email to all API requests
The email can be either in the query string, like `mailto:example@domain.com`, or in the User-Agent request header, like `User-Agent: my-app (mailto:example@domain.com)`.
Read more about the polite pool at [docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication](https://docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication#the-polite-pool).
parameters.name: mailto

get.description: Get a single work by its id

parameters.description: The id of the work to retrieve
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: [docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication](https://docs.openalex.org/how-to-use-the-api/rate-limits-and-authentication#the-polite-pool)
